statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number FROM customer_data
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, expiration_date FROM customer_data
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, security_code FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, expiration_date FROM customer_data WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT customer_name, security_code FROM customer_data ORDER BY security_code DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_data;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email, credit_card_number FROM customers WHERE credit_card_expiry > '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE credit_card_expiry > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, credit_card_number FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT c.name, o.total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, city, zip_code FROM customer_data JOIN address ON customer_data.customer_id = address.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM order_data WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT customer_name, city, order_date FROM customer_data JOIN address ON customer_data.customer_id = address.customer_id JOIN order_data ON customer_data.customer_id = order_data.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_data
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_total FROM customer_data JOIN order_data ON customer_data.customer_id = order_data.customer_id WHERE order_total > 1000
SELECT customer_name, street_address, city, state, zip_code  FROM customer_data JOIN address ON customer_data.customer_id = address.customer_id ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total, payment_status FROM order_data WHERE payment_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM customer_personal_data;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, credit_card_number FROM customer_personal_data;
SELECT city, zip_code, state FROM address_information;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT username FROM account_credentials;
SELECT full_name, credit_card_number FROM customer_personal_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT city, state, zip_code, street_address FROM address_information WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, username FROM account_credentials ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, amount AS transaction_amount FROM customer_personal_data JOIN transaction_history ON customer_personal_data.customer_id = transaction_history.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT city, state, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, street_address, city, state FROM addresses WHERE postal_code = '12345' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, inventory_count FROM products WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
